name: order_tracking
description: Querying the current location or status of a shipment.
utterances: Has it arrived at my city yet?
I want to track my sneakers.
The tracking hasn't moved for three days.
I'm worried about my order arrival.

name: delivery_delay
description: Reporting or inquiring about a late or delayed delivery.
utterances: I'm still waiting for my delivery.
My package hasn't shown up yet.
Why is my delivery taking more time than expected?
I have not received my order yet.
The shipping is very slow this time.
My order is not here yet.
Why is my order still not here?
Is my package lost or just slow?
When will I actually get my stuff?

name: cancel_order
description: Requesting to cancel an order that has not yet been processed or shipped.
utterances: I'm trying to cancel my order.
Please don't ship my order, cancel it.
I want to abort my order.
I made a mistake, cancel the order.
I want to cancel my transaction.
I want to cancel my buying.
Stop the process and refund me.
I made a mistake on my order.

name: return_item
description: Inquiring about or initiating a return for a received product.
utterances: I want to send it back.
I need to return this gift.
I want to return my item.
I want to return my dress.
I changed my mind about the item I received.

name: payment_issue
description: Reporting problems during the payment process or payment failures.
utterances: I'm having a problem with my card.
My card is blocked for this site.
I am worried about my transaction.

name: refund_query
description: Inquiring about the status of a refund or how to get a refund.
utterances: Is my refund on the way?
When will I see the refund?
Why did you take my money?
I'm missing some money from my account.

name: product_stock
description: Checking if a specific product is currently available or in stock.

name: restock_request
description: Requesting to be notified when an out-of-stock item is back in stock.
utterances: Let me know when it's back.
When will it be back in stock?
I want to know when it's here.
Will you ever have this again?

name: account_access
description: Dealing with login issues, password problems, or general account access.
utterances: I need to update my password.
I can't get in my account.
Can I change my email for login?

name: security_alert
description: Reporting suspicious activity, unauthorized access, or security concerns.
utterances: I see a weird charge, is it a refund?
Something is wrong with my account.
